description:
Kisaki Eri is Ran`s mother and the ex-wife of her childhood-friend Kogorou.
She`s also a famous lawyer.
Even though they`re divorced, Eri is still wearing her wedding ring. When asked by Ran about that, she answers that it keeps "other dirty men" away.
Ran hopes that her parents will find back together.
name: Kisaki Eri
